item.title: Retired From Hack The Box - Medium Machine
item.description: Recon: Nmap Scan: Quick Nmap Scan: Open Ports: 80 (http) - 22 (ssh) goku@exploitation:~$ export IP=10.10.11.182 goku@exploitation:~$ nmap $IP Starting Nmap 7.93 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-12-15 05:59 CET Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.182 Host is up (0.022s latency). Not shown: 998 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 0.50 seconds Nmap Full Scan: goku@exploitation:~$ nmap -p- $IP Starting Nmap 7.

item.title: Advent Of Cyber | Day-2- Santa's Naughty & Nice Log - Log File Analysis
item.description: Use the ls command to list the files present in the current directory. How many log files are present? ssh elfmcblue@<ip_address> -p tryhackme! Explanation elfmcblue@day-2-log-analysis:~$ ls *.log | wc -l 2 Elf McSkidy managed to capture the logs generated by the web server. What is the name of this log file? webserver.log On what day was Santa’s naughty and nice list stolen? Based on the result, we can conclude that the attacker led brute force directory against the site to gather available directories.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello Friends!, I am Hassan Al Achek (0xh41) https://github.com/Hassan-Al-Achek/shootCutMe.git https://github.com/Hassan-Al-Achek/LinuxPrivilegeEscalation.git https://github.com/Hassan-Al-Achek/Method.git https://github.com/Hassan-Al-Achek/TheArtOfExploitationSheetCheat.git https://github.com/Hassan-Al-Achek/netdeath.git I am an Electrical and Telecommunication Engineer, Offensive Security Enthusiast, Programmer, Back-End Web Application Developer. You can reach me via Mail.

item.title: Retired From Hack The Box - Medium Machine
item.description: Recon: Nmap Scan: Quick Nmap Scan: Open Ports: 80 (http) - 22 (ssh) ~ ❯ nmap 10.10.11.154 Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-12-07 23:25 CET Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.154 Host is up (0.026s latency). Not shown: 998 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 2.74 seconds Nmap Full Port Scan: ~ ❯ nmap -p- 10.
